bridge-type.label: Plugwise HA Bridge
bridge-type.description: The Plugwise HA Bridge is needed to connect to the Adam HA boiler gateway.

parameter-group.name: config
parameter-group.label: Gateway Configuration
parameter-group.description: Contains the settings needed to connect to the Plugwise Adam HA boiler gateway.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Hostname/IP
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the boiler gateway.

parameter.name: smileId
parameter.label: Smile ID
parameter.description: The Smile ID is the 8 letter code on the sticker on the back of the boiler gateway.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in seconds.
